sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>x_1112263_snuebung.BuildingDataUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>BuildingDataUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var BuildingDataUtil = Class.create();
BuildingDataUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function () {},

    getBuildingData: function (buildingId) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('Gebaeude[x_1112263_snuebung_gebaeude]');
    gr.query();
    
    var buildingData = [];
    while (gr.next()) {
        buildingData.push({
            name: gr.getValue('Position') // Annahme: 'name' ist das Feld, das du abrufen möchtest
            // Weitere Informationen hinzufügen...
        });
    }

    return buildingData;
    },

    type: 'BuildingDataUtil'
};
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
